title: An Interview with Joshua Gibbs
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Thomas was kind enough to reach out to Joshua Gibbs for an interview, and the results speak for themselves. Joshua is a renowned figure in the classical world, and we're happy to have him (and his great big bushy beard) on the podcast.
itunes:author: Just Bees and Joshua on this one
itunes:subtitle: We're in the big leagues now, boys!
itunes:summary: Thomas was kind enough to reach out to Joshua Gibbs for an interview, and the results speak for themselves. Joshua is a renowned figure in the classical world, and we're happy to have him (and his great big bushy beard) on the podcast.
itunes:title: An Interview with Joshua Gibbs
